query:
SELECT r.id, r.customerId, r.amount, r.paymentMethod, r.status, r.transactionId, r.endToEndId, r.createdAt, r.completedAt, r.metadata, c.name, c.pin 
FROM recharges r 
LEFT JOIN customers c ON r.customerId = c.id 
WHERE r.id = 600001
LIMIT 1;

LEFT JOIN customers c ON r.customerId = c.id 
WHERE r.id = 600001
LIMIT 1;
